data.comment: Today's referee, Sang-Hyeop Chae, has blown to start the match.
Throw-in Daegu.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Pohang Steelers in their own half.
Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a Daegu throw-in in Pohang Steelers's half.
Pohang Steelers awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 6, In Pohang a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball goes out of play for a Pohang Steelers goal kick.
Cesinha scores to make it 0-1 at Pohang Steel Yard.
In the minute 11, Daegu's Jeong Seung-won gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Pohang Steelers defender.
Corner awarded to Pohang Steelers.
Sang-Hyeop Chae awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 13, Pohang Steelers to take a throw-in in Daegu territory.
Throw-in high up the field for Pohang Steelers in Pohang.
Throw-in for Daegu at Pohang Steel Yard.
In the minute 15, Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a free kick to Daegu in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers.
In the minute 18, Can Pohang Steelers get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Daegu's half?
Pohang Steelers have been awarded a penalty in Pohang...
Aleksandar Palocevic equalizes with a well-taken penalty.
In the minute 22, Free kick for Daegu in the half of Pohang Steelers.
Daegu push forward at Pohang Steel Yard and Cesinha gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Pohang Steelers defence.
Daegu have been awarded a corner by Sang-Hyeop Chae.
In the minute 23, Free kick Daegu.
Ball safe as Pohang Steelers is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Daegu are pushing forward but Tsubasa Nishi's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 24, Goal kick for Pohang Steelers at Pohang Steel Yard.
Free kick for Pohang Steelers in their own half.
Throw-in for Pohang Steelers in the half of Daegu.
In the minute 28, Pohang Steelers awarded a free kick in their own half.
Manuel Palacios (Pohang Steelers) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Pohang Steelers.
In the minute 29, Pohang Steelers's Aleksandar Palocevic misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Pohang.
Dejan Damjanovic (Daegu) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 31, Daegu have been awarded a corner by Sang-Hyeop Chae.
Pohang Steelers have been awarded a corner by Sang-Hyeop Chae.
Corner awarded to Pohang Steelers.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Daegu in their own half.
Goal! Cesinha gives Daegu a 1-2 lead in Pohang.
Daegu are coming forward and Kim Dae-won gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 36, Pohang Steelers have a goal kick.
Lee Seung-mo of Pohang Steelers gets in a strike, but is off target.
Sang-Hyeop Chae awards Daegu a goal kick.
In the minute 38, Free kick for Pohang Steelers in their own half.
Throw-in for Pohang Steelers in the half of Daegu.
Important block from the Daegu defence as Kang Sang-woo fires in a strike for Pohang Steelers.
In the minute 41, Daegu have a goal kick.
Pohang Steelers awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a Pohang Steelers throw-in in Daegu's half.
In the minute 44, Pohang Steelers have been awarded a corner by Sang-Hyeop Chae.
Ha Chang-rae (Pohang Steelers) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Pohang.
In the minute 44, Pohang Steelers are coming forward and Lee Kwang-hyeok gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Daegu goal kick.
Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers in their own half.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Pohang.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is underway at Pohang Steel Yard.
In the minute 47, Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a throw-in for Pohang Steelers, close to Daegu's area.
Daegu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Pohang Steelers in their own half.
In the minute 49, Lee Kwang-hyeok (Pohang Steelers) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Sang-Hyeop Chae awards Daegu a goal kick.
Goal! The home team draw level at 2-2 through Manuel Palacios.
In the minute 52, Goal kick for Daegu at Pohang Steel Yard.
Daegu to take a throw-in in Pohang Steelers territory.
Can Pohang Steelers get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Daegu's half?
In the minute 54, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Pohang Steelers in the half of Daegu.
In the minute 56, In Pohang Pohang Steelers drive forward through Manuel Palacios. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for Pohang Steelers at Pohang Steel Yard.
Pohang Steelers are pushing forward but Lee Kwang-hyeok's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 58, Daegu have a goal kick.
Sang-Hyeop Chae awards Pohang Steelers a goal kick.
Kim Seon-min of Daegu smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 63, Corner awarded to Daegu.
Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers in their own half.
Free kick for Pohang Steelers in the half of Daegu.
In the minute 67, The home team replace Lee Seung-mo with Stanislav Iljutcenko.
Can Pohang Steelers capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Daegu's half?
Daegu awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 69, It's a goal kick for the home team in Pohang.
Ryu Jae-moon is replacing Tsubasa Nishi for Daegu at Pohang Steel Yard.
Manuel Palacios (Pohang Steelers) has received a yellow card from Sang-Hyeop Chae.
In the minute 71, Daegu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pohang Steelers's Aleksandar Palocevic breaks free at Pohang Steel Yard. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Daegu at Pohang Steel Yard.
In the minute 76, Daegu's Dejan Damjanovic misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Pohang Steelers goal kick.
Kim Sang-won is replacing Lee Kwang-hyeok for the home team.
In the minute 76, Daegu make their second substitution with Chi-In Jung replacing Dejan Damjanovic.
Pohang Steelers drive into the zone and Aleksandar Palocevic is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
Pohang Steelers's Kang Sang-woo gets in a shot on goal at Pohang Steel Yard. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 80, Throw-in Daegu.
Daegu drives forward and Ryu Jae-moon gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Song Min-kyu heads in to make it 3-2 at Pohang Steel Yard.
In the minute 81, That's a fine assist from Aleksandar Palocevic.
Sang-Hyeop Chae awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick Pohang Steelers.
In the minute 83, Lee Jin-hyun is on a sub for Kim Dae-won for Daegu.
Ball safe as Daegu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Manuel Palacios (Pohang Steelers) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 85, Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a free kick to Daegu.
Cesinha of Daegu gets in a strike, but is off target.
Pohang Steelers have a goal kick.
In the minute 86, Go Young-jun is replacing Manuel Palacios for the home team.
Ball safe as Daegu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a Daegu throw-in in Pohang Steelers's half.
In the minute 87, Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a free kick to Daegu in their own half.
Pohang Steelers to take a throw-in in Daegu territory.
Free kick for Daegu in their own half.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Pohang Steelers in their own half.
Daegu awarded a free kick in their own half.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers in their own half.
Throw-in Daegu.
Corner awarded to Pohang Steelers.
Pohang Steelers surge into the attack at Pohang Steel Yard but Song Min-kyuâ€™s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Daegu at Pohang Steel Yard.
The match is over. Final score 3-2.
Choi Yeong-jun (Pohang Steelers) has received a first yellow card.
Kim Woo-seok (Daegu) gets a yellow card.
